name: Speedware
description:
Highlights syntax for Speedware/Autobahn II code. Works for viewing spec files and any txt file with the .spw extension. Also allows for syntax highlighting if Vim is set as external editor in Autobahn.

This is a very rough file, improvements are welcome. I may also be the only one that would actually use this. If you like it or want something changed, please email me at patrick dot rubbs dot regan at gmail dot com.

versions.release_notes: First upload was made on MS-WIN. This uses Unix EOL's so that there is no problems trying to source it in different environments. Also cleaned up bad tabs, do to some custom editor settings I had.
